pkgmetadata.longdescription: atom3-py3=========Processing of 3D atomic data (Python 3 version).Installation------------.. code-block:: console $ pip3 install atom3-py3Usage-----Process a PDB file to a pickled pandas dataframe... code-block:: console $ atom3 parse sample/11as.pdb1.gz sample/parsedDerive subunits of a parsed dataframe... code-block:: console $ atom3 complex sample/parsed sample/complexes.dillSplit subunits into interacting pairs... code-block:: console $ atom3 pairs sample/complexes.dill sample/pairsFor help on commands... code-block:: console $ atom3 -h $ atom3 parse -h
